name: Trufflepod
description: This little friend is an expert at finding gourmet chocolates, its favorite snack! Keep one as a pet, and it will lead you to wonderful treats- just make sure to save a little crumb for your friend as a reward. They don't eat much. Digital painting, by @Jubimoft, 2021. No transfer of rights with NFT. This is not part of the main series of Podpals, as it isn't animated.
